metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2750 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2014-2744, CVE-2014-2745.  Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2014-2744 and/or CVE-2014-2745.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2014-2744 and/or CVE-2014-2745 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: prosody: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
